Package org.wmn4j.notation.elements

Class Chord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.notation.elements.Chord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Note>, Durational
    public final class Chord
extends java.lang.Object
implements Durational, java.lang.Iterable<Note>
    Represents a chord. This class should be used for chords where the notes are all of same length. For polyphonic textures add voices to the Measure. This class is immutable.

        Returns an instance of with the given Note objects.
        Parameters:
        n - A non-empty and non-null array of Note objects
        Returns:
        a chord with the given notes
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if notes is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if notes is empty or all Note objects in notes are not of same duration

      • getNote

        public Note getNote​(int fromLowest)
        Returns the Note at the given index counting from lowest pitch in this Chord.
        Parameters:
        fromLowest - index of note, 0 being the lowest note in the chord
        Returns:
        the note from index fromLowest
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if fromLowest is smaller than 0 or at least the number of notes in this Chord
